## PoolPoweR

```{r}
x <- optimise_sN_prevalence(
  prevalence = 0.005,
  correlation = 0.1,
  cost_unit = 5, 
  cost_pool = 10,
  cost_cluster = 20,
  max_N = 20,
  max_s = 50, 
  sensitivity = 1,
  specificity = 1, 
  form = "logitnorm" 
  )

y <- as.data.frame(x) %>%
  rename(`Optimal pool size` = s, `Cost` = cost, `Catch` = catch, `Optimal number of pools` = N)
y
```



```{r}
x <- optimise_sN_prevalence(
  prevalence = 0.005,
  correlation = NA,
  cost_unit = 5, 
  cost_pool = 10,
  cost_cluster = NA,
  max_N = 20,
  max_s = 50, 
  sensitivity = 1,
  specificity = 1, 
  form = "logitnorm" 
  )

y <- as.data.frame(x) %>%
  rename(`Optimal pool size` = s, `Cost` = cost, `Catch` = catch, `Optimal number of pools` = N)
y
```

```{r}
y %>%
  mutate(Cost = round(Cost, digits = 4))
```

```{r}
optimise_random_prevalence(
  # Survey
  cost_cluster = NA,
  # Cost
  cost_unit,
  cost_pool,
  cost_period,
  # Parameters
  pool_strat_family,
  catch_mean,
  catch_variance,
  prevalence,
  correlation = NA,
  # Advanced
  sensitivity = 1,
  specificity = 1,
  max_period = 10,
  form = "logitnorm",
  verbose = FALSE
)
```

```{r}
o <- optimise_random_prevalence(

  form = "logitnorm",

)

o %>% unlist()
```
